title: Which household products are safe to use? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here's the thing - in the olden days everything could be cleaned easily by stuff our parents or grandparents had on hand.  Now we need more cabinet space to store the special purpose plastic bottles, one for each purpose. Here's a link to some down home cleaning recipes.http://www.apartmenttherapy.com/20-diy-green-cleaning-recipes-141129 You are right to be bewildered by the variety and to question safety. [One caveat in home cleaning with basic products: never mix bleach with ammonia, as it liberates toxic chlorine gas.] Best to you.
